title: IP Gifting for Xayah/Rakan not working
body: I keep getting the message, "An Error Has Occurred: Your friend's gift pool is not large enough to receive a mystery gift."

replies.body: We've been tracking reports on this [gift pool error](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115005959727--Apr-19-Gifting-Champions-with-IP-is-currently-generating-an-unrelated-error-message-this-will-only-occur-if-your-friend-already-has-the-champion-), and it's just confusing messaging on the client.  It turns out that this weird error comes up if you're gifting someone who's already unlocked it on their own.  Let me know if that clears things up!
i have the IP but it says i dont have enough :/
It's happening to me and my friend, too. No reason for it to be happening.

same here, and it's with a friend who i know actually does have a large gift pool available.

riot pls
